data.message: Hey Eminem Slim Marshall if you need a holiday i recommend going to Seychelles Island and theres like about 11 island around it im a seychellewa and my dad was a president there way before i was born my relatives would show you a great time my mother has 19 achers or its hecters the one that runs for ages lol of land your welcome there the prince of england william and princess kate went to seychelles for their honey moon in all the places in the world  no paparatzi the island full of virgins too most of us beleive in sex after marrige. your phenominal *giggles*
